column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////The flavors of this confused me. I felt like the greens on the plate were frivolous. They did not enhance the octopus
column2: and their texture didn't work well make one cohesive bite. The octopus on the other hand was cooked very well
column3: but the flavors were subtle and a rather unidentifiable. The concept for the dish has so much potential
column4: but the execution of it was too all scattered to be enjoyable.
